<!-------- JavaScript -------->

h=a();f>=c||h||(b*=d,g=setInterval(e,b))}let f=0,g=setInterval(e,b)},setupBreakingAlerts(){const a(){const a=c.offsetHeight!==window.refHeaderHeight,d=window.scrollY<am.scrollThresh;return!!(a&&d)&&void b()}function b(){am.group("debug","%cUpdating body margin...","color: a(a){const b=a.querySelectorAll(e);b.forEach(a=>{const b=a.firstChild.data;a.insertAdjacentHTML("afterend",b),a.remove()})}function b(b,c){b.forEach(b=>{b.isIntersecting&&(a(b.target),c.unobserve(b.target),am.log("debug","%cLazy Observation Activated%c for%c "+b.target.id,"color: lime;","color: inherit;","color: PapayaWhip;"))})}function c(b,c){const e=c.offsetTop-d,f=window.scrollY+window.innerHeight;f>=e&&(window.removeEventListener("scroll",b),a(c),am.log("debug","%cLazy Check Activated%c for%c code\]\s*\}/.test(""+IntersectionObserver):0;if(h){const a=new IntersectionObserver(b,{root:null,rootMargin:"50px",threshold:0});f.forEach(b=>a.observe(b))}else f.forEach(a=>{const Activated"),c.parentNode.classList.add("has-animation"))};if(b){const a=new IntersectionObserver(d,{root:null,rootMargin:"0px",threshold:1});a.observe(c)}else 			(function(){
				function loadChartbeat() {
					window._sf_endpt=(new Date()).getTime();
					var e = document.createElement("script");
					e.setAttribute("language", "javascript");
					e.setAttribute("type", "text/javascript");
					e.setAttribute("src",
						(("https:" == document.location.protocol) ?
						"https://a248.e.akamai.net/chartbeat.download.akamai.com/102508/" :
						"https://static.chartbeat.com/") +
						"js/chartbeat.js");
					document.body.appendChild(e);
				}
				var oldonload = window.onload;
				window.onload = (typeof window.onload != "function") ?
				loadChartbeat : function() { oldonload(); loadChartbeat(); };
			})();

      function documentInitOneSignal() {
        var oneSignal_elements = document.getElementsByClassName("OneSignal-prompt");

        var oneSignalLinkClickHandler = function(event) { OneSignal.push(['registerForPushNotifications']); event.preventDefault(); };        for(var i = 0; i < oneSignal_elements.length; i++)

      }

      if (document.readyState === 'complete') {
           documentInitOneSignal();
      }
      else {
           window.addEventListener("load", function(event){
               documentInitOneSignal();
          });
      }

    <ul class="o-subitems">
      <li id="nav-merch" class="c-header-nav-bar__item"><a class="c-header-nav-bar__link u-contrast-hover" href="https://shop.spreadshirt.com/TheMarySue">The Mary Sue Store</a></li>
      <li id="nav-shop" class="c-header-nav-bar__item"><a class="c-header-nav-bar__link u-contrast-hover" href="http://shop.themarysue.com/">Gizmos and Gadgets</a></li>
    </ul>
  </li>
</ul>
<div id="menu" class="o-menu u-100w@mobile is-closed-menu">

  <form id="search" action="https://www.themarysue.com/" method="get" class="hide o-menu-search c-menu-search">

    <path d="M61.55,71.3a39,39,0,0,1-32.47,5.63,37.88,37.88,0,0,1-22.49-16A39.22,39.22,0,0,1,62.33,7.5,38.44,38.44,0,0,1,74.86,23.14,38,38,0,0,1,78,42.72a38.6,38.6,0,0,1-6.86,18.76,10,10,0,0,1,5.14,3.13c2.66,2.69,5.38,5.38,8.07,8.07l13,13a8.25,8.25,0,0,1-9.62,13.26,8.8,8.8,0,0,1-.9-.6c-2.38-2-4.57-4.34-6.8-6.56L64.37,76.12A9.75,9.75,0,0,1,61.55,71.3ZM39.16,68.36a29.08,29.08,0,1,0-.28,0Z"/>

  <div class="c-menu-account">

  <div class="c-menu-social-items">
  <ul class="o-social-items c-menu-social-items u-hide@desktop">

  <li class="soc-twitter soc-item o-social-item c-menu-social-item">

</svg>    </a>
  </li>

  <li class="soc-tumblr soc-item o-social-item c-menu-social-item">

    </a>
  </li>

<section class="o-fcc-full@desktop o-slice c-article-labels">
  <div class="o-slice-inner c-article-category-labels">

  
  </div>
</section>
<article class="o-fcc-2x@desktop o-article c-article">
<div id="article-header" class="c-article-header-area">

        <h1 class="c-article__heading o-article__heading">Artwork Paints Oscar Isaac and Ruth Negga as Gomez and Morticia Addams and I Need This Movie Now</h1>

        <h2 class="subheading c-article__subheading"></h2>

    <div class="o-dateline c-article-post-dateline"><span class="o-dateline__author"><span class="o-dateline__author-prefix">By </span><a href="https://www.themarysue.com/author/rachelleishman/" title="Posts by Rachel Leishman">Rachel Leishman</a></span><span class="o-dateline__date">Oct 15th, 2020, 5:20 pm </span></div>
    <a class="o-comments-link c-article__comments-link" href="https://www.themarysue.com/addams-family-art-romy-jones/#disqus_thread" data-disqus-identifier="525625 https://www.themarysue.com/?p=525625"></a>
</div>
<div id="post-wrap" class="o-post-wrap">

    <div id="post-social">
    <div class="o-share">
  <div class="share-twitter o-share-item">

    <a href="https://twitter.com/share" class="twitter-share-button">&nbsp;</a>
    <script type="text/javascript">
      var related = ['GossipCop', 'Styleite', 'Geekosystem', 'SportsGrid', 'Mediaite', 'TheJaneDough', 'TheBraiser'];
      arrayShuffle = function(in_array) {
        var out_array = [];
        while (in_array.length > 0) out_array.push(in_array.splice(Math.random() * in_array.length, 1));
        return out_array;
      };
      var twitterShareButton = document.querySelector('a.twitter-share-button');
      twitterShareButton.setAttribute('data-count', 'vertical');
      twitterShareButton.setAttribute('data-via', 'themarysue');
      twitterShareButton.setAttribute('data-url', 'https://www.themarysue.com/addams-family-art-romy-jones/');
      twitterShareButton.setAttribute('data-text', 'Artwork Paints Oscar Isaac and Ruth Negga as Gomez and Morticia Addams and I Need This Movie Now');
      twitterShareButton.setAttribute('data-related', arrayShuffle(related).join(','));
    </script>
    <script type="text/javascript" src="https://platform.twitter.com/widgets.js"></script>
  </div>

  <div class="share-facebook o-share-item">
    <div class="fb-share-button" 
      data-layout="button">
    </div>
  </div>

  <div class="share-reddit o-share-item">
    <a href="//www.reddit.com/submit" target="_blank" onclick="window.location = '//www.reddit.com/submit?url=' + encodeURIComponent(window.location); return false"> <img src="data:image/png;base64, " alt="submit to reddit" border="0" /> </a>
  </div>

</div>
  </div>

  <div id="post-body">

    <p><img loading="lazy" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-525645" src="https://am21.mediaite.com/tms/cnt/uploads/2020/10/Artwork-Paints-Oscar-Isaac-and-Ruth-Negga-as-Gomez-and-Morticia-Addams-and-I-Need-in-Now.jpg" alt="Oscar Isaac and Ruth Negga as Gomez and Morticia" width="1200" height="600" srcset="https://am24.mediaite.com/tms/cnt/uploads/2020/10/Artwork-Paints-Oscar-Isaac-and-Ruth-Negga-as-Gomez-and-Morticia-Addams-and-I-Need-in-Now.jpg 1200w, https://am24.mediaite.com/tms/cnt/uploads/2020/10/Artwork-Paints-Oscar-Isaac-and-Ruth-Negga-as-Gomez-and-Morticia-Addams-and-I-Need-in-Now-300x150.jpg 300w, https://am24.mediaite.com/tms/cnt/uploads/2020/10/Artwork-Paints-Oscar-Isaac-and-Ruth-Negga-as-Gomez-and-Morticia-Addams-and-I-Need-in-Now-768x384.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 1200px) 100vw, 1200px" /></p>
<p>Have you ever seen a piece of art and instantly needed more of it in your life? That&#8217;s what happened when I saw Romy Jones&#8217; piece depicting Oscar Isaac and Ruth Negga as Gomez and Morticia Addams.</p>
<blockquote class="twitter-tweet">
<p dir="ltr" lang="en">Ruth Negga and Oscar Isaac as Morticia &amp; Gomez Addams &#x2728; <a href="https://t.co/cZ3wvR4ebq">pic.twitter.com/cZ3wvR4ebq</a></p>
<p>— Romy Jones//Commissions Open (@RominaJones) <a href="https://twitter.com/RominaJones/status/1316777505299234822?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw">October 15, 2020</a></p></blockquote>
<p><script async src="https://platform.twitter.com/widgets.js" charset="utf-8"></script></p>
<p>Pieces like this are beautiful for a lot of reasons, but this piece in particular instantly inspires an interest in me because I want nothing more than a new live-action version of <em>The Addams Family</em> with Isaac leading the charge.</p>
<p>Oscar Isaac as Gomez Addams is something that fans have wanted for quite some time, and sure, we <em>sort of </em>got it with the animated film <em>The Addams Family </em>that was released in 2019. But many want a live-action version because &#8230; look, he&#8217;s the perfect hot Gomez Addams, and we deserve it in 2020. But Morticia has gone back and forth between Eva Green and anyone else that fits the beautiful spooky vibe of our queen Morticia.</p>
<p>Personally though, now I only want Ruth Negga as an option. This artwork is not only beautiful but puts the idea of Negga at the forefront of, at least, my mind. With Anjelica Huston being the most iconic version of the character, it&#8217;d be nice to have a fresh take on Morticia, and Ruth Negga is one of our most talented actresses out there. Plus, who <em>wouldn&#8217;t </em>want her as Morticia?!</p>
<p>But Jones also has a plethora of amazing pieces from our favorite films and sharing different takes on iconic characters.</p>
<blockquote class="twitter-tweet">
<p dir="ltr" lang="en">What We Do in the Shadows &#x1f987; <a href="https://t.co/Xp8SYynZYF">pic.twitter.com/Xp8SYynZYF</a></p>

<p>All I want in this world now is a version of <em>The Addams Family </em>with this casting. It&#8217;s the least 2020 can give us, right?</p>

      if (is_blocked === true) {
      widget_id = 96233;
      }

      });
    })();
  };
</script>

    </div>
          <div class="c-author-bio">
        <p class="c-author-bio__text">Rachel is an I, Tonya stan who used to have a poster of Frank Sinatra on her wall as a kid. She loves superheroes, weird musicals, and wants Robert Downey Jr. to release a new album. She is Leslie Knope and she's okay with that. At least she gets to live in New York City though!</p>
      </div>
        
  </div>

var disqus_title = embedVars.disqusTitle;
var disqus_config_custom = window.disqus_config;
var disqus_config = function () {
    /*
    All currently supported events:
    onReady: fires when everything is ready,
    onNewComment: fires when a new comment is posted,
    onIdentify: fires when user is authenticated
    */
    var dsqConfig = embedVars.disqusConfig;
    this.page.integration = dsqConfig.integration;
    this.page.remote_auth_s3 = dsqConfig.remote_auth_s3;
    this.page.api_key = dsqConfig.api_key;
    this.sso = dsqConfig.sso;
    this.language = dsqConfig.language;

    if (disqus_config_custom)
        disqus_config_custom.call(this);
};

(function() {
    var dsq = document.createElement('script');
    dsq.type = 'text/javascript';
    dsq.async = true;
    dsq.src = 'https://' + disqus_shortname + '.disqus.com/embed.js';
    (document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0] || document.getElementsByTagName('body')[0]).appendChild(dsq);
})();
</script>
</div>
</article>  <aside id="sidebar" class="o-sidebar c-sidebar">

    <div id="sidebar-hook-1" class="sidebar-hook"></div>

    <div class="o-zergnet"></div><script>/* exported zergnetLoad */
/* globals am */
window.zergnetLoad = () => {
  if (!am.detectMobileWidth) {
    const zergnetRoot = document.querySelector('.o-zergnet');
    const zergnetHerald = document.createElement('div');
    const zergnetHeader = document.createElement('div');
    const zergnetTag = document.createElement('div');
    const zergnetDisclosure = document.createElement('div');
    zergnetHerald.classList.add('o-herald');
    zergnetHerald.classList.add('o-herald-right@desktop');
    zergnetHeader.classList.add('o-zergnet__header');
    zergnetHeader.classList.add('o-section-label');
    zergnetHeader.textContent = 'More Around the Web';
    zergnetDisclosure.classList.add('o-zergnet__disclosure');
    zergnetDisclosure.textContent = 'Ads by Zergnet';
    zergnetTag.id = 'zergnet-widget-45041';
    zergnetTag.classList.add('o-zergnet-unit');
    zergnetHerald.appendChild(zergnetHeader);
    zergnetRoot.appendChild(zergnetHerald);
    zergnetRoot.appendChild(zergnetDisclosure);
    zergnetRoot.appendChild(zergnetTag);
    am.loadScript('https://www.zergnet.com/zerg.js?id=45041');
  }
};
</script><script>am.log("debug","%czergnet%c %con", "color:pink;","","color:green;");</script><script>am.log("debug","%crevcontent-sidebar-1%c %coff", "color:pink;","","color:red;");</script><!-- RevContent Sidebar 2-->
 
    <script>
      var revcontentLoadRRail2 = function() {

        console.log('test');
        if (typeof am.poll !== "undefined") { 
          am.poll(customize, 1000, 10, 1.5);
        }

        function customize() {
          
          // Hook Existing Elements
          var revcontentHeader = document.querySelector('#rcjsload_e7bc37 h3');

          // Cancel if hook not found
          if (!revcontentHeader) {
            //console.log('Unable to find hook for Revcontent sidebar');
            return false;
          } else {
            console.log('Customizaing Revcontent sidebar');
          }

          // Create Header
          var revcontentCustomHeader = document.createElement('div');
          revcontentCustomHeader.classList.add('o-section-label');
          revcontentCustomHeader.textContent = 'Around the web';

          // Create Herald
          var revcontentHerald = document.createElement('div');
          revcontentHerald.classList.add('o-herald');
          revcontentHerald.classList.add('o-herald-right@desktop');

          // Apply Customizations
          revcontentHerald.appendChild(revcontentCustomHeader);
          revcontentHeader.parentNode.insertBefore(revcontentHerald, revcontentHeader);
          revcontentHeader.remove();
          document.querySelector('.rc-branding-label').remove();

          return true;
        }

        const div = document.createElement('div');
        div.id = 'rcjsload_e7bc37';
        const referenceNode = document.querySelector('.revcontent-sidebar-placeholder-2');
        referenceNode.parentNode.insertBefore(div, referenceNode.nextSibling);

        // Logic
        (() => {
        var referer="";try{if(referer=document.referrer,"undefined"==typeof referer||""==referer)throw"undefined"}catch(exception){referer=document.location.href,(""==referer||"undefined"==typeof referer)&&(referer=document.URL)}referer=referer.substr(0,700);
        var rcds = document.getElementById("rcjsload_e7bc37");
        var rcel = document.createElement("script");
        rcel.id = 'rc_' + Math.floor(Math.random() * 1000);
        rcel.type = 'text/javascript';
        rcel.src = "//trends.revcontent.com/serve.js.php?w=96217&t="+rcel.id+"&c="+(new Date()).getTime()+"&width="+(window.outerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth)+"&referer="+referer;
        rcel.async = true;
        rcds.appendChild(rcel);
        })();
      };
    </script>

  
  <!-- End RevContent Sidebar 2-->

  <script >
  // <![CDATA[
    var disqus_shortname = 'themarysue';
    (function () {
      var nodes = document.getElementsByTagName('span');
      for (var i = 0, url; i < nodes.length; i++) {
        if (nodes[i].className.indexOf('dsq-postid') != -1) {
          nodes[i].parentNode.setAttribute('data-disqus-identifier', nodes[i].getAttribute('rel'));
          url = nodes[i].parentNode.href.split('#', 1);
          if (url.length == 1) url = url[0];
          else url = url[1]
          nodes[i].parentNode.href = url + '#disqus_thread';
        }
      }
      var s = document.createElement('script'); s.async = true;
      s.type = 'text/javascript';
      s.src = '//' + 'disqus.com/forums/' + disqus_shortname + '/count.js';
      (document.getElementsByTagName('HEAD')[0] || document.getElementsByTagName('BODY')[0]).appendChild(s);
    }());
  //]]>
  </script>

<!-- End Footer JavaScript -->

	<script type='text/javascript' id='disqus_count-js-extra'>

/* ]]> */
</script>
